description: The country's most senior Catholic asks the Vatican to investigate after a new film alleges a cover-up.
title: Polish archbishop refers child sex abuse case to Vatican
title_page: Polish archbishop refers child sex abuse case to Vatican - BBC News
maintext: When the Sekielski brothers' first documentary became a subject of national debate last May, it agreed that a state commission should be set up. But it said it must not solely focus on the sexual abuse of children by priests, but also by members of other professions. The law to create the commission took effect in September, but since then, nothing has happened.
